Title: Detainee Case Management Information System (DeMIS Baarista)
Description: Providing a customized electronic Detainee Case Management Information System (DeMIS Baarista) for the Federal Republic of Somalia. This project was an electronic solution, which supports that government Agency in their management of detainees through the life cycle of their stay. DeMIS to provide a greater continuity of care to detainees by having their complete case history available electronically, as well as management tools accessible through in a secure and protected way. DeMIS enabled the client’s employees including personal officers, compliance officers, property department, programmes & activities co-ordinators can access, review and capture new data on tablets while providing care at the detainee’s side. DeMIS provides a comprehensive suite of Apps that have been custom built for the client and manages the reception, induction, transfer and discharge of detainees throughout their facilities. They include dashboards which give an overview of key information for each detainee, allowing staff to identify risk quickly and easily, include trigger points for certain activities and ultimately create better outcomes. A detainee’s complete case can be viewed and edited from within the detainee dossier

Title: IT Fiber Infrastructure Project
Description: We connected different government offices to each other through fiber optic cables.

Title: Data Center IT Infrastructure (DCI) Project
Description: We set up the Data Center IT Infrastructure (DCI) Project for Federal Government Implementation.

Title: Central Database for Registration (CDR) and Vehicle Registration System
Description: We implemented and delivered a comprehensive a Central Database for Registration (CDR) and Vehicle Registration System Projects for Federal Republic of Somalia. This project improved security accountability for wide government employees.

Title: HRM Biometric System
Description: We developed HRM Biometric System for utilizing biometrics system offers a real-time solution to the government HR managers, both for civil servants and in security sector. This project was an ambitious reform program in security sector to make it able, affordable, acceptable and accountable to FGS. After a successful implementation of HRM Biometric System, our project were spread over other security agencies such as SNA, Police and Custodial Corps and it is useful for FGC up-to-date supplementing the conventional practices of HR analytics. The system simplified multiple tasks of HR department that offers various human resource management solutions based on Biometrics that include: Employee Registration and Filing System, Biometric Attendance System, Biometric Payroll Management System, Visitor Management System, Canteen Management System, Document Management System.

Title: Safe City Management Project
Description: We had managed the Safe City Project Implementation with various vendors.

Title: Micro-Finance Management Systems
Description: We have developed micro-finance management systems. The system is assisting the organizations to manage the entire loans management to their clients is handled. These include: 1. Customer database, 2. Loan portfolios, 3. Interest and Loan Costs Management, 4. Customer Statement Management, 5. Periodic Financial Reports.

Title: Digital Loans Mobile Apps
Description: We had managed the Safe City Project Implementation with various vendors. We implemented a digital loan lending platform for members of department of defence (Military). They apply and disbursed loans real-time at the comfort of their mobile phones.
Client: Department Of Defence (DOD) - Government Of Kenya

Title: myAccountant App
Description: Mobile application products launched by Kangaroo Solutions Limited (KSL) intended to aid small micro-enterprises manage their financial accounts at the comfort of their mobile phones. myAccountant app is targeting small business to achieve their financial freedom.

Title: Human Resource Management System
Description: This a robust human resource management system implemented to several clients including County Government of Nairobi. The system is managing county staff database and the personnel operations including: Leave Management System, Trainings and capacity building, Bio-metrics attendance, Staff appraisals.

Title: Revenue Collection System
Description: We were contracted by County Government of Kakamega and County Government Of Kiambu to Automate their revenue collections processes. We developed several modules to achieve that objective: Permit remittance management, Car parking fees management, Land rates fees management, Urban planning permits management.
Client: County Government Of Kiambu and County Government Of Kakamega
